channel.title: How do you add commands?
channel.description:
Hey can any1 please tell me how to add commands like ::2bill and make it give u 2 bill? and how to i make a spawned npc have a shop??how do i add a shop to it??? X D
ty

item.title: How do you add commands?
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“2bill”)){
addItem(0995,2147000000);
sendMessage(“YOU GET 2BIL”);
}
[br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2007, 05:54:21 PM[/size][hr]You have to learn that by urself…search in client.java for “wanneShop” and look through the coding for how to add an npc for a shop
